mapper.select: SELECT AREA FROM INSAREAVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} AND PRC_CONTENT='승인'

SELECT EXP_CONTENT AS EXPCONTENT , TO_CHAR(EXP_STARTDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EXPSTARTDATE , TO_CHAR(EXP_ENDDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EXPENDDATE FROM INSEXPVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} AND PRC_CONTENT='승인' ORDER BY EXPSTARTDATE DESC
SELECT PRZ_NAME AS PRZNAME, PRZ_MEDAL AS PRZMEDAL , TO_CHAR(PRZ_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PRZDATE FROM INSPRZVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} AND PRC_CONTENT='승인' ORDER BY PRZDATE DESC
SELECT CER_NAME AS CERNAME, ISSUE_NAME AS ISSUENAME , TO_CHAR(CER_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CERDATE FROM INSCERVIEW WHERE REQ_NO=#{reqNo} AND PRC_CONTENT='승인' ORDER BY CERDATE DESC

SELECT C.CLASS_NO AS CLASSNO, C.CLASS_NAME AS CLASSNAME FROM CLASS C LEFT JOIN CLASS_STOP CS ON C.CLASS_NO = CS.CLASS_NO WHERE INS_NO=#{insNo} AND CLASS_STARTDATE<SYSDATE AND CLASS_ENDDATE>SYSDATE AND CS.STOP_DATE IS NULL

SELECT CLASS_NO AS CLASSNO, CLASS_NAME AS CLASSNAME, REVIEW_CONTENT AS REVIEWCONTENT , GRADE, REVIEW_DATE AS REVIEWDATE, MEM_ID AS MEMID, MEM_NAME AS MEMNAME FROM REVIEWVIEW WHERE INS_NO=#{insNo} AND ROWNUM<=2 ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
SELECT CATEGORY, CLASSNO, CLASSNAME, MEMNO, MEMNAME, MEMID, RSVTIME FROM INSSCHEDULEVIEW WHERE INSNO = #{insNo} AND RSVDATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY RSVTIME

SELECT ST.START_TIME AS STARTTIME, ET.START_TIME AS ENDTIME FROM CLASS C LEFT JOIN CLASS_TIME CT ON C.CLASS_NO = CT.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN TIME ST ON ST.TIME_NO = CT.START_TIME_NO LEFT JOIN TIME ET ON ET.TIME_NO = CT.END_TIME_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND CT.TIME_ADD_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(TIME_ADD_DATE) FROM CLASS_TIME WHERE TIME_ADD_DATE <= SYSDATE AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}) AND SYSDATE
INSERT INTO CLASS_TIME(CLASS_TIME_NO, CLASS_NO, START_TIME_NO, END_TIME_NO, TIME_ADD_DATE) VALUES('CT-' || SEQ_CT.NEXTVAL, #{classNo}, #{startTimeNo}, #{endTimeNo}, TO_DATE(#{cerDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
SELECT CER_NO AS CERNO, CER_NAME AS CERNAME FROM CERTIFICATE
SELECT CITY_NO AS CITYNO, CITY_NAME AS CITYNAME FROM CITY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CERTIFICATE_PROOF(PROOF_NO, REQ_NO, CER_NO, CER_DATE, PROOF_PATH, ADD_DATE) VALUES('CP-' || SEQ_CP.NEXTVAL, FN_RECENTREQ(#{memNo}), #{cerNo}, TO_DATE(#{cerDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{proofPath}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO PRIZE(PRZ_NO, REQ_NO, PRZ_NAME, PRZ_MEDAL, PRZ_DATE, ADD_DATE) VALUES('PRIZE-'|| SEQ_PRIZE.NEXTVAL, FN_RECENTREQ(#{memNo}), #{przName}, #{przMedal}, TO_DATE(#{przDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO EXPERIENCE(EXP_NO, REQ_NO, EXP_CONTENT, EXP_STARTDATE, EXP_ENDDATE, ADD_DATE) VALUES('EXPERIENCE-'|| SEQ_EXPERIENCE.NEXTVAL, FN_RECENTREQ(#{memNo}), #{expContent}, TO_DATE(#{expStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#{expEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO INSTRUCTOR_AREA(AREA_NO, REQ_NO, SIGUNGU_NO, ADD_DATE) VALUES('IA-' || SEQ_IA.NEXTVAL, FN_RECENTREQ(#{memNo}), #{sigunguNo}, SYSDATE)
